mai.process

Class ShareMemory

  • java.lang.Object
    • mai.process.ShareMemory

  • public class ShareMemory
extends java.lang.Object
    share a variable associatedDic within the parallel program. Set up a Cube and a Dictionary where associatedDic is used. Variable listWords contains Word which relate to words of a Dictionary.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static boolean associatedDic
      true if a dictionary is associated with a cube, else false.
      private static Cube cube 
      private static Dictionary dic 
      private static java.util.ArrayList<Word> listWords
      list of Word

  • invariant

    public static boolean invariant()
    check invariant before executing the program. This is NOT invariant when:
  • the length of words in the dictionary is greater than the size of the cube.
  • the cube, the dictionary, or both are NOT invariant
